name: CBManagerAuthorization
desc: The current authorization state of a Core Bluetooth manager.

items.name: case allowedAlways
items.desc: A state that indicates the user has authorized Bluetooth at any time.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: A state that indicates the user explicitly denied Bluetooth access for this app.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: A state that indicates the user has yet to authorize Bluetooth for this app.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: A state that indicates this app isnâ€™t authorized to use Bluetooth.
